info.title: Orphanet clincal entities
info.description: An API used to search Orphanet entries.

get.summary: Search for all Orphanet clinical entities.
get.description: The result is a data set that includes an ORPHAnumber, the status, the preferred term and the definition (when one exists) of each active Orphanet clinical entity.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the status of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber and the status of the ORPHAnumber.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the target entity by the obsolete or deprecated clinical entity's ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber and the status of the required entity, with additional 'referred to' or 'moved to' relations pointing to the target ORPHAnumber.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the preferred term of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber required with its preferred term.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the definition of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber required with its definition.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the synonym(s) of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber required with a collection of related synonyms.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the type of group of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber required with its related type of group.

200.description: Type of group of the clinical entity

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the type of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber required with its related type.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the OrphanetURL of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber and the stable URL pointing to the specific page of the clinical entity on the Orphanet website of the ORPHAnumber.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for or check the ORPHAnumber agregation level of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber and the preferred term of the agregation level of the ORPHAnumber that was sought.

200.description: ORPHAnumber agregation level of the clinical entity

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for ICD10 code(s) of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is a collection of data including ORPHAnumber, the stable URL pointing to the specific page of the clinical entity on the Orphanet website, characterisation of the alignment between the clinical entity and ICD-10, and status of the mapping (Validated or Not yet valiated).

200.description: ICD10 code(s) of the clinical entity

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the clinical entity's ORPHAnumber by ICD-10 code.
get.description: The result is a dataset including ORPHAnumber, status, preferred term and definition.

200.description: Clinical entity correpsonding to specific ICD10 code

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the list of classification(s) of the clinical entity by its ORPHAnumber.
get.description: The result is the ORPHAnumber and preferred term of the clinical entity with a data set or each classification where the clinical entity is present (set includes: unique identifier of the classification, name of the classification, ORPHAnumber and name of the n+1 clinical entity).

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the list of clinical entities' ORPHAnumbers in one specific classification by the unique identifer of the classification.
get.description: The result is a data set including ORPHAnumber, status, preferred term and definition of all clinical entities.

200.description: List of clinical entities under specified classification

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for information about the n+1 (parent) of the clinical entity in one specific classification by the clinical entity's ORPHAnumber and unique identifier of the classification.
get.description: The result is a data set including ORPHAnumber, status, preferred term and definition of all clinical entities.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for information about the n-1 (child) of the clinical entity in one specific classification by the clinical entity's ORPHAnumber and unique identifier of the classification.
get.description: The result returned the ORPHAnumber and preferred term of the clinical entity with a data collection for the searched classification  (data set includes: unique identifier of the classification, name of the classification, ORPHAnumber and name of the n-1 clinical entity also named as 'child' of the clinical entity).

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the clinical entity's information by OMIM code.
get.description: The result is a data set including ORPHAnumber, status, preferred term, definition, the relationship between the clinical entity and the OMIM code and the status of the mapping.

200.description: Clinical entity correpsonding to specified OMIM code

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for the clinical entity's information by name.
get.description: The result is a data set including ORPHAnumber, status, preferred term and  definition.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

Definition.example: A rare sex chromosome number anomaly disorder characterized, genetically, by the presence of an extra X and Y chromosome in males and, clinically, by tall stature, dysfunctional testes associated with infertility and insufficient testosterone production, cognitive, affective and social functioning impairments, global developmental delay, and an increased risk of congenital malformations.

enum: particular clinical situation in a disease or syndrome

Definition.example: Marfan syndrome is a systemic disease of connective tissue characterized by a variable combination of cardiovascular, musculo-skeletal, ophthalmic and pulmonary manifestations.

A rare sex chromosome number anomaly disorder characterized, genetically, by the presence of an extra X and Y chromosome in males and, clinically, by tall stature, dysfunctional testes associated with infertility and insufficient testosterone production, cognitive, affective and social functioning impairments, global developmental delay, and an increased risk of congenital malformations.
Marfan syndrome is a systemic disease of connective tissue characterized by a variable combination of cardiovascular, musculo-skeletal, ophthalmic and pulmonary manifestations.
